title: No to AUKUS, no to war!
excerpt: The AUKUS pact ties us to decades of nuclear militarism and a potential future war. Right now, Trump officials want Australia to go even further. But with AUKUS under review in the US and UK, we have a rare chance to act. Add your name to demand an inquiry and walk away.
